hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: linux_user
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the user on which to deploy the project structure

hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.name: linux_group
hudson.model.StringParameterDefinition.description: the group of the user on which to deploy project structure

hudson.tasks.Shell.command: ###Deploy project structure ### if [ -d apps ] then sudo rm -rf apps mkdir -p apps/shared_dir/apache/apps-shared_dir-apache mkdir -p apps/docker_mysql/server_mysql mkdir -p apps/docker_apache/server_apache mkdir -p apps/docker_php/server_php sudo chown -R $linux_user:$linux_group apps; else mkdir -p apps/shared_dir/apache/apps-shared_dir-apache mkdir -p apps/docker_mysql/server_mysql mkdir -p apps/docker_apache/server_apache mkdir -p apps/docker_php/server_php sudo chown -R $linux_user:$linux_group apps; fi sudo rm -rf /home/${linux_user}/apps sudo mv apps/ /home/${linux_user} ###Clean docker environment### sudo /home/${linux_user}/scripts/clean_docker_all.sh
